summary.intro: At Innovation For Impact, we’ve worked with student orgs, startups, and local businesses to ship data-driven, design-forward products.

experience.label: Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning
experience.description: We prototype and deploy ML models for tasks like classification, recommendation, and forecasting. Projects range from small internal experiments to end-to-end pipelines that integrate with client products.

experience.label: Front-End Development
experience.description: We ship responsive, accessible UIs using modern frameworks and clean component systems. Our focus is on intuitive flows, fast load times, and making complex data feel simple.

experience.label: Back-End Development
experience.description: We design APIs, data models, and services that are reliable and easy to maintain. This includes integrating third-party APIs, building dashboards, and handling authentication and analytics.

experience.label: UI / UX Design
experience.description: We work with clients to refine user journeys, wireframes, and visual systems. From quick clickable prototypes to polished design systems, we keep user needs and clarity at the center.

testimonials.name: Celine Darvas
testimonials.quote: IFI was amazing to work with. The team was responsive, creative, and shipped exactly what we needed.

testimonials.name: Arleen Cheema
testimonials.quote: They felt like an extension of our own org – super professional, but still fun and easy to collaborate with.

internal.name: IFI Website
internal.description: Our homepage website you're on right now! Built to showcase our work and make it easy to get in touch.

cta.title: Interested?
cta.body: Reach out and we’d love to discuss what IFI can build for you.
